name: .env editor
description: A Replit extension that lets you import and export your secrets as a .env file.
longDescription: A Replit extension that lets you export and copy all of your secrets as a `.env` file.

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read any file in your Repl

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Write to any file in your Repl and execute any code

features.title: .env importing
features.body: If you used to use `.env` files in VSCode, now you can use this extension copy over your secrets from there automatically!

features.title: .env exporting
features.body: If you're moving away from Replit (ðŸ˜­) and need to use `.env` files, you can use this extension to quickly copy your secrets and paste them directly into a `.env` file!
